Nervous System Diseases/Neurotoxicity Syndromes/Alcohol-Induced Disorders, Nervous System
Record.Description: Acute and chronic neurologic disorders associated with the various neurologic effects of ETHANOL. Primary sites of injury include the brain and peripheral nerves.
